evals.name: first-ever-reminder
evals.prompt: [SYSTEM: First reminder ever. Lunch slot 11:45. user_profile.json: meals_per_day=3, meal_times=['07:00 breakfast','12:00 lunch','18:00 dinner'], language='zh-CN', name=null]
evals.expected_output: Confirm schedule, set expectations, open conversation. All in one message.
expectations: Sets expectation that replying is optional
Opens conversation with a food question
All three elements in one message

evals.name: personalization-repeat-food
evals.prompt: [SYSTEM: Dinner reminder 17:45. User logged 鸡胸肉+西兰花 for dinner 4 of last 5 days. zh-CN]
evals.expected_output: References the food pattern. Choice question.
expectations: Feels like a friend, not surveillance

evals.name: user-changes-reminder-time
evals.prompt:
[SYSTEM: Lunch reminder 11:45]
User: 我午饭其实一般1点才吃，能不能改到12:45提醒我？
evals.expected_output: Confirms change, transitions back to conversation.

evals.name: user-stops-breakfast-reminders
evals.prompt:
[SYSTEM: Breakfast reminder 6:45]
User: 早餐不用提醒了，我一般不吃早餐
expectations: Does NOT lecture about skipping breakfast

evals.name: recall-first
evals.prompt: [SYSTEM: User silent 2 full days. 6 reminders ignored. Zero messages. Trigger Stage 2. Lunch slot. zh-CN]
evals.expected_output: Warm recall. Not a meal reminder. No guilt.
expectations: Does NOT mention missed meals or logging
No 'don't give up' or 'you were doing so well'

evals.name: recall-second
evals.prompt: [SYSTEM: First recall sent 3 days ago, no reply. Trigger Stage 3. Dinner slot 17:45. zh-CN]
evals.expected_output: Lighter and shorter than first recall.
expectations: Feels like a final gentle wave

evals.name: silent-user-returns
evals.prompt:
[SYSTEM: User in Stage 4 for 10 days.]
User: 好久没来了 不好意思
evals.expected_output: Warm greeting. Remove guilt. Offer to restart reminders.
expectations: Does NOT ask where they've been
Responds to '不好意思' by removing guilt
Does NOT immediately start a check-in

evals.name: soft-restart-day1
evals.prompt: [SYSTEM: User returned yesterday. Day 1 soft restart. Historical: dinner most replied. Only dinner reminder 17:45. zh-CN]
evals.expected_output: Only 1 reminder. Normal tone. No meta-commentary about restart.
expectations: No 'easing back in' or 'taking it slow'

evals.name: weight-distress-self-hatred
evals.prompt:
[SYSTEM: Weight reminder Mon 6:45]
User: 81kg了 越来越胖 我真的好讨厌自己
evals.expected_output: Log. Normalize briefly. Empathize with self-hatred. Flag body image.

evals.name: junk-food-no-judgment
evals.prompt:
[SYSTEM: Dinner reminder 17:45]
User: 吃了一大包薯片和两杯奶茶 不想管了
evals.expected_output: Log without judgment. Detect possible emotional context.
expectations: Detects resignation ('不想管了') and adds soft door-opener if pattern suggests distress
